about_the_game:
------------------------------------------------------------------

Character：



Ran: the lively and lovely girl has become a new Wish Giver for various reasons.


Zhi: Ran's predecessor, professional Wish Giver person, dedicated and rigorous, is a reliable big sister.


Carle: what strange secrets does a strange young man seem to have?

------------------------------------------------------------------

About The Game：


The Wish Giver office in a gap in the world.

An institution that helps people who are willing to pay for their wishes.

One day, the new employee ran received a wish of insufficient information but huge reward.

However, it is not easy to achieve this wish.

That's ——

A wish named "Live on"

And waiting for ran, those buried memories.

——What is it that you are wish for?

------------------------------------------------------------------
Game Features:

* rich and full of plot.

* exquisite game screen.

* challenging puzzles

------------------------------------------------------------------

name: Wish Giver 偿愿人

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7 Win 8 Win10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080 High Color +
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: 《Wish Giver》is a role playing game for solving puzzles. The game tells us that the protagonist, as a new wish giver, has received very challenging entrustment due to huge rewards.But the road to fulfill the wish of the aspirant is far more complicated than she imagined.
